item.title: ðŸŽ‰ My second paper has finally been accepted!
item.description:
Excited to share that my second paper, “Chance-Constrained Trajectory Optimization for UAVs with Randomly Moving Obstacles”, has been accepted by IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems.

Submitted on Feb 21, 2025 to IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems.
Received major revision on Jun 10, and resubmitted on Jul 9, and accepted on Sep 23.

item.title: ðŸŽ‰ My first paper has finally been accepted!
item.description:
Excited to share that my first paper, “Two-sided Chance-constrained Penetration Trajectory Optimization for Unmanned Combat Aerial Vehicle”, has been accepted by the AIAA’s Journal of Aircraft!

Submitted on Jan 23, 2025 to Journal of Aircraft.
Received Major Revision on Jun 5, resubmitted on Jun 19, and accepted on Jun 25.

ðŸ‘‰ Read the article on AIAA ARC
